name: Sumit
review: The service is perfect, i would recommend them, they respond quicky and kindly.

name: Hero Alom
review: Shipping was fast and the items were well packed! For the price of the CPU and the cooler, t'was basically a good old $50 off of retail!

name: Jxcoon khan
review: Ahmed at Custom PC Building went above and beyond to help me design and build a beast of a recording studio computer. I will most definitely use this company again!

name: Redxan
review: Great work with the Desktop they made for me. I am greatly satisfied for choosing them to create my pc.

name: Taskin
review: I’m very happy with my new computer and service :)

name: Jinda Islam
review: Great condition, as expected, friendly and quick

name: Summit
review: Products and build are as described everything runs and works great

name: Rexjsond Khan
review: Purchased a gaming PC in Jan 2020. Pricing was competitive and final product was great and was delivered to my door. All expectations exceeded. Nice guy too. Highly recommend!
